install.name: Rapid Recipe Plugin
install.author: Guillermo Vargas
install.description: Xmap's Extension for Rapid Recipe component

param.name: cats_order
param.label: Categories order
param.description: In which order do you want the categories listed on your sitemap?

param.name: include_links
param.label: Show Recipes
param.description: Should we include recipes into the sitemap?

param.name: links_order
param.label: Recipes order
param.description: In which order do you want the recipes?

param.name: max_links
param.label: Max links
param.description: Max number of recipes per category to include on sitemap (Leave empty for no limit)

param.name: max_age
param.label: Newest than
param.description: Only show recipes newer than this number of days (Leave it blank to ignore this option)

param.name: @spacer
param.label: XML Sitemap
param.description: Options for the XML sitemap only

param.name: cat_priority
param.label: Category Priority
param.description: Set the priority for the categories

param.name: cat_changefreq
param.label: Category Change frequency
param.description: Set the chage frequency for the categories

param.name: recipe_priority
param.label: Recipe Priority
param.description: Set the priority for the recipes

param.name: recipe_changefreq
param.label: Recipe Change frequency
param.description: Set the chage frequency for the recipes
